messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis, with the assistance of Chauffeaur Rodney R0binson, handled the decedent. Technician Muhammad documented and secured evidence. Sergeant McMullen briefed Detective Morton on the crime scene. Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers performed tests on witnesses. Detective David Trehan's reports confirmed the homicides. Detective Morton and Detective Ryan Aucoin managed the crime scene and evidence collection. Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, Detective Melvin McCullum, and Detective Pratt were all involved in various capacities. Officer Gary Sallienger from the Scientific Criminal Investigations Division also contributed to the scene sketch.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted by Chauffeur Rodney Robinson in handling the decedent.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Documented and secured evidence at the crime scene.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Briefed Detective Morton on the crime scene.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Performed tests on the witnesses related to the crime.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: His reports confirmed the homicides.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Managed the crime scene and was briefed by Sergeant McMullen; also involved in evidence collection.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ryan AucoinOfficer Context: Directed the crime lab in processing the crime scene.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Mentioned as a unit manned by the detective sergeant.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Mentioned as a unit manned by the officer.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Context: Mentioned as a unit manned by the officers.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittOfficer Context: Mentioned as a unit manned by the officers.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Detective Gregory JohnsonOfficer Context: Mentioned as a unit manned by the detective.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Jason McGeeOfficer Context: Mentioned as a unit manned by the detective.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ananie MitchellOfficer Context: Mentioned as a unit manned by the detective.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Melvin McCullumOfficer Context: Mentioned as a unit manned by the detective.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective PrattOfficer Context: Handled a scene on Mazant Street as part of the homicide section.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Officer Gary SalliengerOfficer Context: Contributed to the scene sketch from the Scientific Criminal Investigations Division.Officer Role: Officer
